process.title: How It Works
process.subtitle: Transparent and iterative: agree → build → deploy → support.

step1.title: Discovery & Scoping
step1.text: Quick call and brief: goals, constraints, integrations, SLA. We outline scope and estimates.

step2.title: Architecture & Plan
step2.text: High-level design: modules, queues, databases, deployment topology. Lock API contracts and schemas.

step3.title: Build & Test
step3.text: Short iterations: feature → unit & integration tests → review. Demo every 1–2 weeks.

step4.title: Deploy & Support
step4.text: CI/CD, containers, observability (logs/metrics/alerts). Handover docs and procedures.
